name: Pong w/ Advanced AI
description:
AI that trash talks, this is your average pong game but with a  Machine Learning Agent trained using Reinforcement Learning. The other difficulties(Easy, Medium, Hard, Extreme) just follow the ball's Y Pos at different speeds.

Watch how it was made:
